body:
Below full list of aliases from InitialSessionState.cs.

@lzybkr Could you please make a conclusion where we should remove unneeded options?
(Tomorrow I'll push new tests for the options in #3595 - maybe it is easy to make the conclusion by means of the .ps1 file?)

Alias | Cmdlet | Option1 | Option2 | Conclusion
-|-|-|-|-
"foreach" |      "ForEach-Object" | ReadOnly | AllScope
"%" |      "ForEach-Object" | ReadOnly | AllScope
"where" |      "Where-Object" | ReadOnly | AllScope
